summary: REQ-13/14/15 appear implemented via a new LoginScreen, top-level gating in App.tsx based on identity/initialization, and a logout handler in StockRegisterPage. REQ-16 is partially addressed by adding permission checks to write methods, but the backend implementation introduces broader role/access-control machinery beyond anonymous-only rejection and adds other unrequested authorization-gated APIs.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced role-based access control (admin/user permissions) and authorization mixin/state beyond basic authenticated-vs-anonymous gating.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly disallows role-based access control beyond basic authenticated vs anonymous gating; diff adds AccessControl, permissions, and admin checks.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new backend user profile APIs with authorization checks (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requested restricting stock write operations for anonymous callers; user profile management was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend write operations now require a '#user' permission rather than only rejecting anonymous principals.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 requires rejecting anonymous callers; the diff enforces a stronger permission model (hasPermission(..., #user)) that may reject authenticated callers lacking that permission, which is beyond the stated requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified an immutable-path authentication hook file (useActor.ts) and added admin-token initialization behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints say not to modify files in frontend/immutablePaths (explicitly including frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts). The diff modifies it and adds logic to read a secret token and call _initializeAccessControlWithSecret.

hallucinated_features.description: Added URL parameter/sessionStorage utilities (urlParams.ts), including handling of a 'caffeineAdminToken'.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; appears tied to the new admin/access-control behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a 'caffeine.ai' promotional footer/link and non-English/emoji heart in the Login screen footer text.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; also the heart symbol is additional UI content outside the specified login requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded Stock Register features unrelated to authentication (matrix layout, print/export enhancements, Tailwind/theme changes, xlsx dependency).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused on authentication gating and backend anonymous-write restriction; these broader UI/feature changes are unrequested.
